uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.remote
Class MediaPlayerProcess

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.remote.MediaPlayerProcess

public class MediaPlayerProcess
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulation of a media player process. This class is experimental and is subject to change or complete removal.
